title: Tau Bada The Quest and Memoir of a Vulnerable Man
description: Tau Bada: The Quest & Memoir of a Vulnerable Man is a personal trek of self-discovery, growth and revelations that connect the vulnerabilities in us all. Follow John on a captivating journey that confronts longstanding superstitions, ancient clan-based conflicts and deeply rooted cultural mores of the American West and the South Pacific. The author poses the question, “What was risky, and what was I fearful of?” Go along as he ventures down untraveled roads on an uncharted inward journey where there are no maps.
author: John E. Quinlan
